personal.name: Manish
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.description: Passionate full-stack developer with 1.5+ years of experience creating scalable web applications. I specialize in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.content:
I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions. With a background in computer science and 1.5+ years of industry experience.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or enjoying the great outdoors. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that truly make a difference.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced project tracking capabilities.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that provides detailed weather information, forecasts, and interactive maps using multiple weather APIs.

projects.title: Blog CMS
projects.description: A content management system for bloggers with markdown support, SEO optimization, and a clean, minimalist design.

experience.description: Lead a team of 4 developers in building scalable web applications. Architected and implemented microservices infrastructure that improved system performance by 40%.
Developed and maintained multiple client-facing applications. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and reduced deployment time by 60%.
Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Focused on performance optimization and user experience improvements.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects.
